2 Optimal heat transfer 2.1 Motivations Heat transfer is important in both daily life and the industry. Almost everyone in the United States has either an air-conditioner or a heater; nuclear plants and data centers need sophisticated heat transfer systems to stay cool. 2.2 Mathematical background The main tools for our analysis come from probability.
